prompt: Design a music player UI with a modern material design theme and a light background. Place a square album cover with rounded corners and a subtle shadow at the top center. Display the song title in a bold, sans-serif font with dark gray text and the artist name in a smaller, gray font below it. Include a progress bar with a teal fill and time indicators in a clean, sans-serif font. Center a row of playback controls (skip-previous, play/pause, skip-next) using elevated buttons with a material design shadow effect and teal accents. Add a volume slider with a teal speaker icon at the bottom. Use a white background and a single-column layout with balanced spacing for a clean, professional look.
